children.name: num_cols
children.label: How many columns would you like?

children.name: rotating_text
children.label: Add Rotating Text Headline:
children.help_text: This will give you the option to build one of those fancy headlines that rotates in one section.

children.name: text_beginning
children.label: H1 Text (Beginning):
children.help_text: Leave this blank if you'd like the beginning of the phrase to rotate.

children.name: text_rotating
children.label: H1 Text (Rotating):
children.help_text: Use a comma between the words you'd like to cycle through. Do not add a comma after the last word.

children.name: text_end
children.label: H1 Text (End):
children.help_text: You can leave this blank if you'd like the end of the phrase to rotate.

children.name: rotating_text_color
children.label: Rotating Text Color
children.inline_help_text: Edit the color of the text that rotates only.

children.name: add_lottie_file
children.label: Add Lottie File (Animation)
children.help_text: Lottie files are super sweet animated files that you can find here: https://lottiefiles.com

children.name: lottie_embed
children.label: Paste Lottie Player Embed Code:
children.help_text: When pasting the code DO NOT include the line that starts with "script".  IMPORTANT: To ensure the animated image is responsive on all screen sizes, set the width to 100% and remove the height property (style="width=100%")   See commodore documentation for directions.

children.name: form_width
children.label: Form Width in Column (%):
children.help_text: This will allow you to control the size of the form from within the column.

children.name: submit_alt
children.label: Use Submit Button Alternative Style:
children.help_text: This is the alternative style that you can set from the Global Style Settings Module.

children.name: btn_inline
children.label: Put button on same line as the input field:
children.help_text: IMPORTANT:  Only use this when you have a single input field in the form.  If there are multiple, chances are it's going to look really wonky.

children.name: vert_align_center
children.label: Vertical Align Content
children.help_text: This feature is awesome when the column to the right or left is much longer and you want this one to be centered vertically in this column.
children.inline_help_text: Align this column's content so it's centered with the column next to it.

children.name: video
children.label: Embed Video:
children.help_text: Select INSERT then EMBED, then paste the link to your video in.

children.name: test
children.label: Test:
children.inline_help_text: This is currently a test. Please disregard.

children.name: video_clip
children.label: ██████ Upload Video Clip
children.help_text: With this video player you can add multiple smaller video clips that will get stitched together. This will help the page load much faster.  PRO-TIP:  Go to www.youcompress.com and compress your MP4 files so they are even faster to load.  Generally, you want between a 2 -3MB file size.

children.name: mp4
children.label: Video (MP4):
children.help_text: When uploading a video you want to keep the file size as small as possible so that it loads quickly.  Generally, you're going to want to keep it under 20MB.

children.name: video_bg_image
children.label: Video Background Image
children.inline_help_text: Adding a still frame from the first video clip will help preview a flash when the video completes its loop.

children.name: parallax
children.label: Parallax Scrolling:
children.help_text:
If you turn this on, be sure that you have uploaded a background image with a large enough height so that there is room for the image to do its scrolling magic. 

IMPORTANT: If you are not using a background image, it's BEST to keep this off.

children.name: parallax_on_mobile
children.label: Parallax On Mobile
children.help_text: Enables Parallax On Mobile

children.name: parallax_scale
children.label: Parallax Scale
children.help_text: Between 1.2 - 1.5 is the sweet spot. The larger the number the more zoomed in the photo will be to account for how fast the parallax moves. Be gentle.
children.inline_help_text: This controls the speed of the parallax.

children.name: bg_size
children.label: Background Size:
children.help_text:
Cover: Resize the background image to cover the entire container, even if it has to stretch the image or cut a little bit off one of the edges

Contain: Resize the background image to make sure the image is fully visible.

Initial: Sets this property to its default value.

children.name: bg_position
children.label: Background Position:
children.help_text: When you have parallax scrolling turned OFF, this will give you a little bit of control to say which part of the image you'd like in view.

children.name: bg_custom_mobile
children.label: Activate Mobile Settings for BG Image
children.help_text: This will give you super control over the position of your background image on mobile.
children.inline_help_text: Control the size and position of the background image on a mobile device.

children.name: bg_size_mobile
children.label: Background Size (Mobile)
children.help_text: This one is a bit tricky and you'll have to play with it to get it just right. I'd suggest opening up a preview window of your page and keep refreshing till you get it.
children.inline_help_text: This is going to set a percentage (background-size: X% auto;)

children.name: bg_pos_rl_mobile
children.label: Background Position Right/Left (Mobile)
children.help_text: This one is a bit tricky and you'll have to play with it to get it just right. I'd suggest opening up a preview window of your page and keep refreshing till you get it.
children.inline_help_text: This is going to set a background position (background-size: Xpx Ypx;)

children.name: bg_pos_tb_mobile
children.label: Background PositionTop/Bottom (Mobile)
children.help_text: This one is a bit tricky and you'll have to play with it to get it just right. I'd suggest opening up a preview window of your page and keep refreshing till you get it.
children.inline_help_text: This is going to set a background position (background-size: Xpx Ypx;)

children.name: bg_pos_tb_neg
children.label: Make BG Top/Bottom Position Negative
children.inline_help_text: This will shift the image up.

children.name: full_screen_bg
children.label: Full Screen Background:
children.help_text: By turning this on, the background image or color will take up the entire height of the browser window.

children.name: scroll_down
children.label: Show Scroll Down Animation:
children.help_text: Turning this on will show a little animation letting someone know there is more content below.

children.name: overlay_bg
children.label: Do you want to add an overlay?

children.name: add_wave_btm
children.label: Add Wave/Angle Border (Bottom)
children.help_text: This is a cool page design element that can give your page a sense of flow and movement.
children.inline_help_text: Add wave or angled border at the base of row.

children.name: color
children.label: Color:
children.help_text: If the row below has a white background you'll want to set the color of the way to white.
children.inline_help_text: Set this to the same color as the row below.

children.name: top_margin
children.label: Top Margin:
children.help_text: You can adjust this setting according to the height of your header so that the content isn't butted up right next to it.
